title: Minutemen Scans Event Pack - Batman R.I.P.
description:
Event:
Batman R.I.P.


Plot:
The mysterious Dr. Simon Hurt and the "Black Glove," a criminal organization dedicated to corrupting virtue, attempt to destroy Batman and everything he stands for.



Event Pack Contains the following:
Incentive, 2nd, and 3rd printing variants as well as the R.I.P. checklist are also included in a separate variants & misc folder.


Batman 676-681 + variants
Batman and the Outsiders 11-13
Detective Comics 846-850
Nightwing 147-150
Robin 175-176
